title: Looking for Ranked team
body:
Looking for team between bronze - gold!

IGN: CIAÔ
I currently play all roles. Best to worst: Support, Jungle, Top, Mid, ADC
I currently main: Leona, Lulu, Fiddlesticks, Volibear, Warwick
i currently in silver 2 but i have played with friends in higher tiers.
i am avalaible everyday from morning till late. (im only unavaliable on wednesday and thursdays from 6:00-10:30)
i use skype
im currently 21 years old

replies.body: Ay man, I'm looking to start a ranked team once iv got enough players, I'm currently in Bronze 3 and want to climb but with a team that isn't salty or toxic. If you don't mind playing with a less experienced player thats a quick learner, then hit us up if you're keen to join. IGN: CastielZaim11
